track.name: Summertime
comments: SUMMERTIME ANYTIME NO BAD TIME TO HEAR THIS CLASSIC FROM TWO LEGENDS
this recording is perfection on every level...an absolute masterpiece...!
Bartender,please pour me a double Brandy with a Beer chaser. All is well. Summertime and the living is easy...
I like the music must not the song
So much better than the shrieky Janis Joplin version.
A wonderful interpretation of this Gershwin classic
my favourite version of Summertime. Louis' horn intro is sublime
Unquestionably my favorite vocal version of the Gershwin classic.
Que excelente sonido, que bellas imágenes...todos los temas son maravillosos. Acabo de adoptarles para todos mis momentos que esté utilizando el computador !! Saludos.
grammy hall of fame winner in 2001(2)
hot solo intro by pops followed by ella's cool response...beautiful...even the orchestration---which i usuallly hate---fits and makes this recording a classic (2)
grammy hall of fame winner in 2001
hot solo intro by pops followed by ella's cool response...beautiful...even the orchestration---which i usuallly hate---fits and makes this recording a classic
@Carlana "haha yes, very overplayed" ? Is it possible to overplay 'Summertime' ? This track is one of the best, but do see the Summertime tag radio.
